comments.text:
I was originally trying to use dzslides for a talk and made firefox full-screen.  This makes Firefox very sluggish.  It works mostly fine for other websites (like bugzilla for instance).  I don't think its a dzslides problem because it seems to work fine on other Operating Systems (Mac for one).

URL to test: http://nigelb.me/talks/mozcamp-burnout/
comments.author: nigelbabu@gmail.com
comments.creator: nigelbabu@gmail.com
